control_attributes.Control: AC-19 ACCESS CONTROL FOR MOBILE DEVICES
control_attributes.control_description: The organization: a. Establishes usage restrictions, configuration requirements, connection requirements, and implementation guidance for organization-controlled mobile devices; andb. Authorizes the connection of mobile devices to organizational information systems.

Control Statement: The organization: a. Establishes usage restrictions, configuration requirements, connection requirements, and implementation guidance for organization-controlled mobile devices; andb. Authorizes the connection of mobile devices to organizational information systems.
Control Name: AC-19 ACCESS CONTROL FOR MOBILE DEVICES
